text: Stephen McHattie Smith (born February 3, 1947)Other sources cite 1945, 1947, and 1948. is a Canadian actor.Profile, nytimes.com; accessed February 4, 2018. He won the Genie Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in The Rocket, and a Gemini Award for Life with Billy. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Nova Scotia
title: Stephen McHattie
